#include <iostream>
#define ll long long
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
#define m 1000000007
void multiply(ll F[2][2], ll M[2][2])
{
  ll x =  (F[0][0]*M[0][0] + F[0][1]*M[1][0])%m;
  ll y =  (F[0][0]*M[0][1] + F[0][1]*M[1][1])%m;
  ll z =  (F[1][0]*M[0][0] + F[1][1]*M[1][0])%m;
  ll w =  (F[1][0]*M[0][1] + F[1][1]*M[1][1])%m;

  F[0][0] = x;
  F[0][1] = y;
  F[1][0] = z;
  F[1][1] = w;
}

void power(ll F[2][2], ll n)
{
  if( n == 0 || n == 1)
      return;
  ll M[2][2] = {{1,1},{1,0}};

  power(F, n/2);
  multiply(F, F);

  if (n%2 != 0)
     multiply(F, M);
}


ll fib(ll n)
{
  ll F[2][2] = {{1,1},{1,0}};
  if (n == 0)
    return 0;
  power(F, n-1);
  return F[0][0];
}



/* Driver program to test above function */
int main()
{
ll t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    ll n;
    cin>>n;
    ll ans=fib(n);
    cout<<ans<<endl;

}
}
